description: Displays the self correction rate of the Student
Displays the Words spoken per minute of the Student
Displays Student's ability to understand the meaning of the words
Displays Student's ability to recognize the words
Displays Student's ability for letter recognition
Displays Student's ability to understand initial sounds
Displays Student's ability to understand the high frequency words
Displays Student's ability to writing words
Displays Student's ability to recognize and manipulate the sounds of language
Displays Lexile Level of the Student
